abstract: Shares in blue-chip heavyweight HSBC plunged more than 10 percent to a six-year low on Monday, joining a global equities sell-off on fears of the impact of a global recession on corporate profits.
lead_paragraph: Shares in blue-chip heavyweight HSBC plunged more than 10 percent to a six-year low on Monday, joining a global equities sell-off on fears of the impact of a global recession on corporate profits.

headline.main: HSBC Dives More Than 10 Percent In Stock Sell-Off
